## OpenSearchConfig.optimizedHealthcheckId property

Specifies whether Dashboards should only query the local OpenSearch node when all nodes in the cluster have the same node attribute value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly optimizedHealthcheckId?: string;
```
